entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 11:41 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
